title: What are the important quotes and dates that reveal Dante's age and birthdate in the Divine Comedy?
first_phrase: The following section features select passages from Dante's Divine Comedy, specifically from Inferno and Purgatorio. These passages include references to time, astrological events, and chronological milestones, such as the breaking of a pathway. Frater Petrus provides additional context to the text, with reference to Dante's age and birth year, as per the testimony of Ser Piero di Messer Giardino da Ravenna.

Frater Petrus: Secondo la testimonianza di Ser Piero di Messer Giardino da Ravenna, raccolta dal Boccaccio, Dante vicino a morire (Settembre 1321) avrebbe indicato la propria età in 56 anni e 4 mesi. In base a questa indicazione, la sua data di nascita si colloca nel Maggio del 1265.
last_phrase: In conclusion, through various sources and evidence, it is likely that Dante Alighieri was born between May 21 and May 31, 1265. His legacy and works continue to inspire generations and his memory lives on.
